title: some one played with my account
body: So someone logged in on my account deleted my friends list, got me an s rank in a few ranked games, changed my green text under my name, but did not change my password.  i have changed my password and want to know if i can get more information on what happened to my account on the 5th and 6th of November.

replies.body: If you're worried about if they did any damage, just make sure you hit up the account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to review your account with you there after verifying that you're the original creator.
You would have to take this up in a private support ticket, not here on a public form.
